ComicInfo.Summary: The life of Alex's father is in deadly danger as he falls into the hands of a bloodthirsty vampire who has gone mad. Alex will do anything to save him, even joining forces with the deadly Red Hood, but will that be enough? It's a battle for power in Crimson #6!
ComicInfo.Title: The Children of Judas, Part Three: Running Mates
